channel.title: Mopar server registration
channel.description:
since i'm a 1st timer. umm for the server registration part what do i put for host name , ip, port?
for ip do i put my static ip or the default? i'm very confused or do i put the no - ip?

kk i’ll post if i have probz[br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2007, 06:32:26 PM[/size][hr]well it says tht it’s offline. i think i port fowarded wrong can some 1 help me? like remote assist me kind of help. bc i tried port fowarding thousands of times and i used tuts and everythin

Read full topic

item.title: Mopar server registration
item.dc:creator: @madgamer madgamer
item.description:
@madgamer wrote:

Depends.

If you’re using the server with no-ip then you would just put what you entered into the no-ip.com website. Then put port and host name.
If you’re using Hamachi then you need to put your hamachi IP (when you have Hamachi loaded your IP will be at the very top, above the scroll bar), hamachi networks that you have registered, Hamachi Password, and port.

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
